document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Miridae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Cimicomorpha)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Miridae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Cimicomorpha)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Listed from Hamadan by
Khanjani & Kalafchi ( 2000 )
, Mirab-balou et al. ( 2007, 2008 ) and Mirab-balou & Radjabi ( 2013 ). The records from Iran and Pakistan need confirmation (
Aukema et al. 2013
). General distribution. Widely distributed in Europe and Northern Palaearctic Asia.
